# confirmationRequired(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## Declaration

```swift
class func confirmationRequired(with urlToConfirm: URL?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **urlToConfirm**: The value that resolves the request but must be confirmed by the user.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INURLResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method when you can’t resolve the parameter to a destination type that’s similar to, but not equal to, the one specified in the intent. Don’t use this method to resolve date types that your app doesn’t support.

## Creating a Resolution Result

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
